thread.section_title: Serenity Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Serenity Insurance | serenitygroup.com
thread.title: CHASITY ARCHER
thread.title_full: Serenity Insurance reviewed by CHASITY ARCHER

author: CHASITY ARCHER
title: CHASITY ARCHER
text: I had been shopping around for insurance for about 2 days. I was getting very frustrated with the rates I was receiving. Then I got a phone call from Serenity. They found what I needed at a price about $200 cheaper then I had been able to find on my own. I was on the phone for about 30-40 minutes and by the end of the call I was relieved to have car insurance again. The agent I spoke to was very polite and even funny and witty at time!
